entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
